General.Name: Devon Energy Corporation
General.Description: Devon Energy Corporation, an independent energy company, explores for, develops, and produces oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids in the United States. It operates in Delaware, Anadarko, Williston, Eagle Ford, and Powder River Basin. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.
General.Address: 333 West Sheridan Avenue, Oklahoma City, OK, United States, 73102-5015

5.Name: Mr. David Gerard Harris
5.Title: Exec. VP & Chief Corp. Devel. Officer
